org.jenkinsci.plugins.managedscripts.Scr.name: Ensure cpp-ethereum-cmake is there
org.jenkinsci.plugins.managedscripts.Scr.comment: Clone cpp-ethereum-cmake if it's not there
org.jenkinsci.plugins.managedscripts.Scr.content: if [ ! -d cpp-ethereum-cmake ]; then git clone https://github.com/ethereum/cpp-ethereum-cmake fi
